column5: I posted a while ago that I had a carb. problems, and Big Cliff said he could take look at it. True to his word, he came over this morning, cleaned the carb and checked out the whole machine. What a Guy !!.....Thank you Cliff  P.s. Nice of you to bring Beans with you, havent seen the pair of you for a while. Ya both looking good.
That's really good of you Cliff  .
There's a few of dem good lads around here... and that Cliff's the lead engineer.
Yup. He helped me a few years back at his own expense. He a beauty... Thanks again Cliff.
It was my pleasure and BTW Jack thank you so much for taking the time to show us those magnificent carvings you have done, they are absolutly beautiful. I couldn't believe some of the detail!

What Jack didn't mention is that Cliff took care of my snow blower before we headed over to his place...Yep !...What a guy Eh ?...  Good to see you are doing well Jack and the hormone treatment is working...Jackie is lookin' good too...  Only eight days and we will see ya at the "Manor"...
I was happy to read a possitive post!  Congrats to all involved
